content: kitty love supplies - 1 skien bella chenille yarn amethyst 100g 131yd - 5 00mm h crochet hook - poly-fil stuffing - lockable stitch marker - yarn needle - scissors - wooden chopstick - tacky glue gauge 12 stitches x 12 stitches = 4-inch square cat ends approx 9 tall and 4 wide heart balloon approx 4 tall by 5 wide not including chopstick handle abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet mc magic_ring decrease decrease stitch 2 together increase increase 2 single_crochet in one stitch cat body round 1 chain 11 single_crochet in second chain from hook and next 8 4 single_crochet in last stitch of chain turn work to work opposite side of chain single_crochet to 8 4 single_crochet in last stitch of chain mark last stitch in round 26 stitches round 2-7 single_crochet in each stitch moving marker to track end of round round 8 single_crochet 11 decrease single_crochet 11 decrease 24 stitches round 9-10 single_crochet in each stitch round 11 single_crochet 4 decrease 4 times 20 stitches round 12-16 single_crochet in each stitch round 17 single_crochet 3 decrease 4 times 16 stitches fasten_off leaving long tail stuff through open top head round 1 chain 11 single_crochet in second chain from hook and 8 more of chain 4 single_crochet in last stitch of chain chain 1 turn work to work opposite side of chain single_crochet 9 4 single_crochet in last stich of original chain chain 1 mark last added chain as last stitch of round 28 stitches round 2 single_crochet in each stitch round 3 decrease single_crochet 7 decrease 2 times single_crochet 7 decrease 24 stitches round 4 single_crochet 3 increase 6 times 30 stitches rounds 5-8 single_crochet in each stitch round 9 single_crochet 4 decrease 5 times 25 stitches round 10 single_crochet 3 decrease 5 times 20 stitches add safety eyes between rounds 6 and 7 spaced 7 stitches apart i e eye-5 stitches-eye stuff the top of the head round 11 single_crochet 2 decrease 2 times single_crochet 2 single_crochet 2 decrease 2 times single_crochet 2 16 stitches round 12 single_crochet in each stitch fasten_off add nose in pink embroidery floss on round 8 between safety eyes i e stitch 3 of the five between the eyes use white embroidery floss to add whiskers between rounds 8 and 9 and 9 and 10 or as many whiskers as you wish stuff remaining space in head using open bottom being sure to shape ear points at top feet make 2 round 1 6 single_crochet in mc 6 stitches round 2 2 single_crochet in each stitch around 12 stitches rounds 3-4 single_crochet in each stitch around fasten_off leaving long tail and lightly stuff arms make 2 round 1 6 single_crochet in mc 6 stitches rounds 2-5 single_crochet in each stich fasten_off leaving long tail tail round 1 6 single_crochet in mc 6 stitches round 2 single_crochet in each stitch around round 3 single_crochet increase 3 times 9 stitches rounds 4-12 single_crochet in each stitch around fasten_off leaving long tail and
